concept.title: Couchbase Server concepts
concept.shortdesc: Couchbase Server is an open source distributed NoSQL document database that provides low latency data management for large scale, interactive online applications. It is designed to scale, especially horizontally, with ease and without performance degradation. Built with a strong emphasis on reliability, high availability, and simple management, Couchbase serves data non-stop with minimal human intervention.

Couchbase helps meet the requirements of multiple use cases ranging from enterprise to Cloud infrastructure, to Internet of Things and big data, to mobile devices.
